name: Rifle Tactics
description: Training on handling and engaging targets effectively with rifles in combat environments.

cards.title: Controlled Pair Drill
cards.description: Firing two precise shots in succession to neutralize threats efficiently.
cards.bulletpoints: Rapid sight picture acquisition, trigger reset efficiency, recoil management
cards.summaryText: Hammer controlled pairs by reacquiring the sight picture instantly, rolling the trigger reset, and taming recoil so both rounds land.

cards.title: Cover and Fire Maneuver
cards.description: Using cover effectively while engaging hostile targets in tactical movement.
cards.bulletpoints: Shooting from cover, movement coordination, suppressive fire tactics
cards.summaryText: Dominate firefights by hugging cover, bounding with teammates, and layering suppressive fire to box in threats.
